div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
228793007Planning target volume (observable entity)
228791009Gross tumor volume (observable entity)
228792002Clinical target volume (observable entity)

Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/umls
CodeDisplay
C2936599Organs at Risk

description.value: Codes describing the types of body volumes used in radiotherapy planning and treatment. The value set includes the most common codes from DICOM CID 9534 Radiotherapy Targets (UID 1.2.840.10008.6.1.1244) and adds a code for Organs at Risk (OAR).
